thread.title: Michelle Gubitosa:

author: Michelle Gubitosa:
title: Michelle Gubitosa:
text: I found The Mirror Vompany online. The pricing was incredible since it included installion. The customer service was perfect...I was send a couple of emails confirming the date and time of installation. The installer contacted me the day before to confirm their arrival...they were on time and installed the mirror quickly and professionally. I will definitely use them again.
